__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on LibreOffice and OpenOffice.org! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your '''Launchpad Id''' in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged. 

=== Tools ===

For doing your work easier during the hug days remember to use the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuBugDay/Tools|hugday-tools]]</nowiki>.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===

To sign up for 5-A-Day participation, please add your Launchpad ID to the Participants column. (This is not the email address you used for signing up for LP, but the last part of the URL that https://launchpad.net/people/+me redirects you to (everything behind the ~ sign)):

   1. Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
   2. Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID. 

Also sign up here: https://launchpad.net/~5-a-day-participants/+join

=== Upstream projects ===

The '''OpenOffice''' upstream Bug Tracker and Homepage are:

OpenOffice bugs are tracked upstream at <nowiki>[[http://qa.openoffice.org|qa.openoffice.org]]</nowiki>. 
Go-OO (ooo-build) bugs are tracked upstream at <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.novell.com|bugzilla.novell.com]]</nowiki>.
Homepage is <nowiki>[[http://www.openoffice.org|www.openoffice.org]]</nowiki>. 

If you can reproduce any of the bugs listed below in LibreOffice, mark them as also affecting LibreOffice and if you find the same bug in the LibreOffice tracker, set a bug watch to it.

The '''LibreOffice''' upstream Bug Tracker and Homepage are:

* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.freedesktop.org/buglist.cgi?product=LibreOffice|Bug Tracker]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.libreoffice.org/|Home Page]]</nowiki>

Please check for already bugs filed in the upstream Bug tracker before sending our reports.

=== Stock Responses ===

For problem specific Stock Responses see: <nowiki>[[Bugs-Responses]]</nowiki>
